mapper.insert: insert into video (id, user_id, audio_id, video_desc, video_seconds, video-path, video-width, video_height, cover_path, like_counts, status, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{audioId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoSeconds,jdbcType=REAL}, #{videoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoWidth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{videoHeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{coverPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{likeCounts,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
